original_text: After he stayed among them not more than eight or ten days, he went down to Caesarea. And the next day he took his seat on the tribunal and ordered Paul to be brought.
korean_text: 베스도가 그들 가운데서 팔 일 혹은 십 일을 지낸 후 가이사랴로 내려가서 이튿날 재판 자리에 앉고 바울을 데려오라 명하니

sentences.original_text: After he stayed among them not more than eight or ten days
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들과 함께 팔에서 열흘 정도 머문 뒤에

sentences.original_text: he took his seat on the tribunal
and ordered Paul to be brought.
